property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Eclipse Colorer is a syntax Highlighting plugin for the Eclipse IDE. Based on a open source library "Colorer-take5", supports more than 200 different syntaxes and languages. Shows outline for the majority of the languages, could be flexibly configured.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
